General.Name: Shenzhen Liande Automatic Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Liande Automation Equipment co.,ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, sales, and service of flat panel display, semiconductor equipment, and lithium battery equipment in China and internationally. The company's products portfolio includes POL lamination, bonding, lamination, testing, inspection, 3C, TV module, general, semi-conductor, car display, 5G, and photovoltaic equipment. Shenzhen Liande Automation Equipment co.,ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
